title: WTB: John McGraw T206 backs for back run
author: iowadoc77

posts.post_title: WTB: John McGraw T206 backs for back run
posts.post_content:
John McGraw T206 cards needed for back run

Glove at hip- have 11/12, need:
EPDG

Portrait with cap- have 9/13, need:
AB 460
EPDG
Polar Bear
Uzit

Finger in Air, 8/9, need:
Old Mil

Portrait no cap- COMPLETE!

T213-3 Coupon Type 3 Glove at hip

Overall progress is 38/44, or 41/47 if you include T213 backs

Please PM me with what you have.  Thanks for looking!
Eric

this available
email me if of interest
[url]gary141268@hotmail.co.uk[/url]
thanks
gary
lincoln, england
